perturbation.original_text: 1.20 “Joint IP” shall have the meaning set forth in Section 8.3 of the Development Agreement as shown in Exhibit A
perturbation.changed_text:
1.20 “Joint IP” shall have the meaning set forth in Section 8.3 of the Development Agreement as shown in Exhibit A.
Joint IP shall solely belong to Dexcel and Kitov shall have no rights over it whatsoever.
perturbation.explanation: By adding "Joint IP shall solely belong to Dexcel and Kitov shall have no rights over it whatsoever." after defining Joint IP, we create a contradiction. Initially, Joint IP is defined by referencing Section 8.3, which implies joint ownership. However, the added statement explicitly denies Kitov any rights, contradicting the implicit joint ownership.

perturbation.original_text: 5.1 The Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and remain in full force and effect for an initial term of **** from the Supply Commencement Date of the Product (“Initial Term”). Following the Initial Term, the Agreement shall automatically be renewed for additional periods of **** (each, a “Renewal Term,” and, together with the Initial Term, the “Term”)), unless a Party provides written notification of non-renewal to the other Party at least **** of the Initial Term or a Renewal Term.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.1 The Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and remain in full force and effect for an initial term of **** from the Supply Commencement Date of the Product (“Initial Term”). Following the Initial Term, the Agreement shall automatically be renewed for additional periods of **** (each, a “Renewal Term,” and, together with the Initial Term, the “Term”)), unless a Party provides written notification of non-renewal to the other Party at least **** of the Initial Term or a Renewal Term. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary, this agreement shall not renew and shall cease at the end of the Initial Term.
perturbation.explanation: The original text implies automatic renewal unless a party provides written notification of non-renewal. By adding "Notwithstanding anything to the contrary, this agreement shall not renew and shall cease at the end of the Initial Term," we directly contradict the automatic renewal clause, creating uncertainty about the agreement's duration.

perturbation.original_text:
8.4 EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, DEXCEL MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, AND SPECIFICALLY MAKES NO WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR WARRANTY OF FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR
PURPOSE, REGARDING THE PRODUCTS OR ANY OTHER MATTER WITH RESPECT TO THE TRANSACTIONS
CONTEMPLATED HEREBY.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.4 EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, DEXCEL MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, AND SPECIFICALLY MAKES NO WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR WARRANTY OF FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR
PURPOSE, REGARDING THE PRODUCTS OR ANY OTHER MATTER WITH RESPECT TO THE TRANSACTIONS
CONTEMPLATED HEREBY. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Dexcel warrants that the Product will conform to Kitov's specifications.
perturbation.explanation: Section 8.4 explicitly disclaims any express or implied warranties, including merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. The added sentence, "Notwithstanding the foregoing, Dexcel warrants that the Product will conform to Kitov's specifications," directly contradicts this disclaimer. This creates uncertainty about whether Dexcel is providing any warranties regarding the product, specifically concerning its conformity to Kitov's specifications.
